ChengCheng-kung/ZhengCheng-gong鄭成功(1624-1662),i.e.,KoxsinjaorCoxin-gaderivedfromKuo-hsing-yeh/Guo-xing-yé国姓爺:"LordoftheImperialsur-name",borninHiradoasasonofChengChi-lung/ZhengZhi-long鄭芝龍,originallynamedChengSen鄭森In1645thePrinceofT'ang唐王,proclaimedsuccessoroftheMingEmperorbyChengChi-lung,bestoweduponChengSentheimperialsurnameChukandorderedhisnamechangedtoCh'eng-kung.In1658,heattackedNankingbutinvain.In1662,heconqueredTaiwananddiedtherein
